lines.text:
[talking to Daffy as he watches TV]
Hey, Daffy, how about taking a hike down to, uh...
What gives? I invited you up here for a vacation and all you want to do is watch TV.
Which is extremely difficult when somebody is constantly butting in.

[talking to outside people]
Well, if you can't lick 'em, you might as well join them.
I wonder if Daffy will remember that he can fly.
I wonder if that silly duck will remember that he can swim.
[Just after "Beat Your Buddy" was mentioned, Daffy Duck calls it his favorite and never misses watching it, Bugs speaks to the audience]
Oh goody, this my all time favorite show, I never miss it.

[after Daffy calls "Beat Your Buddy" his favorite, Bugs speaks to listeners and watchers]
Huh, he never misses any of them.
